ui_flow_edition.c

Interface functions and callbacks for the “Flow Edition” page.

Summary
ui_flow_edition.cInterface functions and callbacks for the “Flow Edition” page.
PublicPublic functions
Functions
flow_edition_setup_uiAssembly the flow edit ui_flow_edition->widget.
flow_edition_load_componentsLoad current flow’s (gebr.flow) programs
flow_edition_component_activatedShow the current selected flow components parameters
flow_edition_component_activatedChange the flow status when select the status from the “Flow Component” menu.
PrivatePrivate functions
Functions
flow_edition_component_selectedWhen a flow component (a program in the flow) is selected this funtions get the state of the program and set it on Flow Component Menu
flow_edition_menu_addAdd selected menu to flow sequence
menus_show_helpShow’s menus help

Functions

flow_edition_component_selected

static void flow_edition_component_selected(void)

When a flow component (a program in the flow) is selected this funtions get the state of the program and set it on Flow Component Menu

PS: this function is called when the signal “cursor-changed” is triggered also by hand.

flow_edition_menu_add

static void flow_edition_menu_add(void)

Add selected menu to flow sequence
